name: Web 101
tagline: Web Development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Ember
body:
### Welcome to Web 101

This mini-course will help you get started with learning HTML and CSS to create webpages and progress to JavaScript and Ember to create web applications.

### Prerequisites on Mac OS X

1. [Install homebrew](http://brew.sh)
2. [Install git](http://git-scm.com/download/)
3. [Create a GitHub account](https://github.com)
4. [Set up git](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git/)
5. [Install Sublime Text](http://www.sublimetext.com/3)
6. [Install Package Control for Sublime Text](https://packagecontrol.io/installation)
7. [Install Handlebars package for Sublime Text](https://github.com/daaain/Handlebars#installation)
8. [Install Ember CLI](http://www.ember-cli.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
